attributes.action: Allow me to keep my wife in the UK!
attributes.background: As a member of the British military fortunate enough to have served overseas I have, like many other personnel, married someone who is a citizen of the EU with a European passport. With the recent decision to leave the EU, guidance will be needed by personnel on how this will affect their families.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling for spouses of current and former British military personnel to be entitled to British citizenship, if that is what you would like to happen.
